full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSHIN PO'I DUR 'DEBS KYI SA DPYAD SOGS JI LTAR BYA TSUL CHO GA MDOR BSDUS GZHAN PHAN SNYING PO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI RIG 'DZIN DPAL MGON BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS, TSAD LDAN PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS BYUNG BA LTAR BRIS PA LA LHA SHES ZHES SU GRAGS PA'I TZIS MKHAN PA SNAM DPYOD CAN GZU BOR GNAS PA RNAMS KYIS GZIGS NA THUGS KYIS LI KHREL ZHU'O, YI GE PA NI BSOD NAM DBANG PHYUG GI BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS GYUR CIG ,LEGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
author_simple: DPAL MGON BZHAD RDOR MING CAN,
